title: Herbalife Nutrition
summary: Herbalife Nutrition Ltd. is a global multi-level marketing (MLM) corporation that develops and sells dietary supplements. The company was founded by Mark R. Hughes in 1980, and it employs an estimated 9,900 people worldwide.[3][4] The business is incorporated in the Cayman Islands,[5] with its corporate headquarters located in Los Angeles, California.[6] The company operates in 94 countries through a network of approximately 4.5 million independent distributors and members.[3][7][8][9][10][11][12][13][14] John O. Agwunobi has been the company's chief executive officer and executive chairman since March 2020.[15]
